heading: HB00002
0: AN ACT CREATING THE DEPARTMENT OF OVERSEAS FILIPINO WORKERS (OFW) AND FOREIGN EMPLOYMENT, DEFINING ITS POWERS AND FUNCTIONS, APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR, RATIONALIZING THE ORGANIZATION AND FUNCTIONS OF GOVERNMENT AGENCIES RELATED TO MIGRATION, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
principal-authors: CAYETANO, ALAN PETER "COMPAÑERO" S.; CAYETANO, MARIA LAARNI ; DUTERTE, PAOLO Z.;
mother-bill statusstatus: Approved by the House on 2020-03-11, transmitted to the Senate on 2020-03-16 and received by the Senate on 2020-03-16 Substituted by HB05832
